comment: I can upload pictures with ease thank you :)

title: Works great
comment: Would be nice if there was a way to add text with the image. I realize this is using work arounds due to the lack of an api (?) but it would be nice feature :) thanks though! Edit: Thanks! Let me know if I can help in any way.

title: Doesn't work.  Fails to get login credentials
comment: All I can get out of this is a modal dialog with a spinner and msg saying "Logging in and getting CSRF Token..."  I'd be happy to update my review once that's fixed.

Hi Steve,

I started looking at your problem tonight.  I can't see your email address through the review, but would you please email me at roadriverrail+elloshare@gmail.com?  I would like to talk to you about the bug you're experiencing so I can make sure to fix it correctly.

Best,
Rhett

title: Sweet
comment: I'll try my best at getting this to work with ElloAndroid. And of course I will link back to you :)
